attributes.action: Devolution to England - Give England its own parliament.
attributes.additional_details:
There have been articles and newspaper columns over the years to back our claims. This comes from both right leaning papers and left leaning papers. Examples below.

www.independent.co.uk/voices/commentators/mary-dejevsky/mary-dejevsky-why-we-need-an-english-parliament-351129.html%3Famp

https://www.express.co.uk/news/uk/161309/English-parliament-support-grows/amp

https://www.opendemocracy.net/ourkingdom/james-dennison/english-parliament-best-way-to-save-uk
attributes.background:
Due to the recent announcement that Nicola Sturgeon demands a second ref on Independence. It is time to give all the nations within the UK a say on matters that effect them.

Scotland have a Scottish Government
Wales have the welsh assembly
N'Ireland have an assembly

Why not the English?
